text.section:
This section applies to:
each individual health insurance policy that:
provides coverage on an expense-incurred basis; and
provides coverage for a family member of the insured;
each group health insurance policy that:
provides coverage on an expense-incurred basis for employees of an employer or employers or members of a union or unions; and
provides coverage for a family member of a covered employee or member; and
each individual service or indemnity contract that:
is issued by a nonprofit health service plan; and
provides coverage for a family member of the subscriber.

On request, an insurer that issues an individual or group health insurance policy that provides coverage on an expense-incurred basis or a nonprofit health service plan shall offer family members' coverage to an insured or subscriber regardless of the marital status of the insured or subscriber.

section.section: An insurer or nonprofit health service plan may require proof that the insured or subscriber is the grandparent of the grandchild.
If the insurer or nonprofit health service plan requires proof under this subsection, the insurer or nonprofit health service plan shall pay the cost of the proof.
